BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 300159Z NOV
   BY M/V NPS OCEANIC ENDEAVOUR TOWING 12
   FIVE MILE LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   24-12S 041-57W, 24-57S 041-31W,
   23-44S 039-58W, 22-27S 039-42W,
   22-58S 040-48W, 23-11S 040-41W,
   23-20S 040-48W, 23-39S 041-57W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2877/13.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 300259Z NOV 13.
